RTCCodecStatsChannels.summary: The channels property of the dictionary is a positive number containing the number of channels supported by the codec.

remarks.para: For audio codecs, a value of 1 specifies monaural sound while 2 indicates stereo.

-codecs.channels option in parameter passed to RTCRtpTransceiver.setCodecPreferences() and RTCRtpSender.setParameters().
-codecs.channels in object returned by RTCRtpSender.getParameters() and RTCRtpReceiver.getParameters().

RTCCodecStatsChannels.value: A positive number indicating the number of channels.
